channel.title: My compiler doesnt work!
channel.description:
Says- You do not have JDK [b]5.0[/b] or [b]6.0.[/b] Go to Mod Taharok's Tutorial on the moparscape tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions link to download the newest JDK update.
Ok so i did this, and i downloaded jdk. but my compiler still doesnt work...
my compiler log is completly empty and when i click edit on compiler.bat, it comes up with a notepad that is [b]COMPLETLY[/b] blank... So if you could help me i would greatly appreciate it. I have my server up atm. But i cant update it without the compiler.
Also if you could get a link, to show me excactly what JDK i need i would also greatly appreciate it. Thanks :)

item.title: My compiler doesnt work!
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

that has got to be the biggest most pointless client I’ve ever seen

Read full topic

item.title: My compiler doesnt work!
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

just in case’’

[code]@echo off
title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler

:def
%b%== b5
%t%== t7
:main
cls

echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Compiler V1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo – Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
echo –
echo – commands below (no CAPS)
echo –
echo – Works with all jdk versions (not any jdk 5’s tho)
echo –
echo – only versions 6u1 - 6u12 (netbeans ok) and 7u1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- *** Main Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- com = compile ur server files.
echo ----
echo ---- run = run server (basically same thing as runserver.bat).
echo ----
echo ---- *** Seconhand Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- set = change settingz…
echo ----
echo ---- creds = My Creits
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- No Leechin!! unless all credits to Epic Owner
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

set /p mains=-- Select a cmd…-

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds
if %mains%==extra goto extra

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling server…
echo — Its Compiling time
echo — processing…
echo —
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo — checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1)
echo —(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!)
echo —
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo — Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

:extra
cls
title Elvemage 0o’s extraz
echo dont leech i beg please…
echo if you do give me like 50% creds?? please??
pause

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo — Port:
echo — 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)

title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
:set
cls
echo — Enter commandz for BaCkGrOuNd CoLoR.
echo — B0 = Black
echo — B1 = Blue
echo — B2 = Green
echo — B3 = Cyan
echo — B4 = Red
echo — B5 = Purple
echo — B6 = Yellow
echo — B7 = White
echo — pick one
echo ----------------
echo — Enter commandz for TeXt cOlOr.
echo — T0 = Black
echo — T1 = Blue
echo — T2 = Green
echo — T3 = Cyan
echo — T4 = Red
echo — T5 = Purple
echo — T6 = Yellow
echo — T7 = White
echo — Pick one

set /p s= – uR cHoIcE:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Thanks to:
echo —
echo — Elvemage 0o, owner of edge-pk.zapto.org
echo —
echo — Owner of Epicscape v1 and edge-pk client v1
echo —
echo — Contact me at elvemage0o@live.com
echo —
echo — 100% credits – Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — If You need any server help contact me. im good at coding/ servers
echo —
echo — My Moparscape forums name is Elvemage 0o (zero then lowercase o)
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
pause
cls
goto main

[/code]

item.title: My compiler doesnt work!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

ok

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

use that

Read full topic
